release.action: Strategized the parsing and writing of configurations sources.
Added additional host matching using regex patterns
Fixed unit tests to comply to the improvement changes made
Added ability to handle global (*) environment properties
Added ConfigurationFactory to allow for Spring dependency injection

Added ConfigurationPlaceholderConfigurer to be used in xml context. Similar to Spring's PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer but instead of using Property files it uses commons Configuration as the source of the properties.
Moved the schema definition out of the RuntimeConfigurationHandler class into META-INF so upgraded schemas can be configured without modifying code.
